title: FEDERAL EXPRESS CANADA
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: federal_express_canada
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $73.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with FEDERAL EXPRESS CANADA. The average
  contract duration was 0.76 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.9M.
  The longest contract was 5 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $90.4M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '73.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '48'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '12'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '25%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '73%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.58'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '294.7K'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.76'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '1.9M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '5'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '90.4M'
